title: Call Screening no longer works as of a couple days ago. Just answers the call.
content:
As of a couple days ago my Screen Call feature just stopped working. When I tap "Screen Call" it just answers whatever call is coming in. 

I haven't installed anything new in the past few days, so I assume it must be the most recent software update.

Still running Android Pie, haven't installed the Beta for Q. 

Help!
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 3
